widgets_values:
{
  "taskId": "4e6360d472ca90d9b437d32d9479800a",
  "parentMusicId": "",
  "param": {
    "callBackUrl": "https://example.com/kie-suno-callback",
    "customMode": true,
    "instrumental": false,
    "model": "V5",
    "prompt": "[Intro – Spoken Word, Low-Passed Drone, Rising Sub-Swell, Cold Street Ambience, Close-Mic Male Voice]
Not hate.
Not revenge.
Not silence.
Just… gone.

Ghostin’ — the softest exit from the hardest truths.
If you wouldn’t want it done to you,
don’t throw it at the ones who stood through your storms.

Let’s talk facts.


[Verse 1 – Cold Grit Flow, Tight Compression, Minimal Drum Layer, Forward Vocal Mix]
Two years deep on reckless roads,
Nine years wired, no peace, just codes.
We swung hard — no saints in that mess,
Both dropped lines we still regret.

But we came back — bruised, not fake,
Truth stitched up what pain would break.
We weren’t perfect, weren’t clean or sweet,
But real ain’t tidy, and real ain’t neat.


[DROP 1 – Beat Cut, Sub-Bass Explosion, Distorted Reverb, Aggressive Male Shout]
No flex in pain, no pride in scars,
But we told truths in foreign bars.
From dust to laughs, from fire to screams,
That bond felt deeper than it seemed.

Then you ghosted — sharp, no breath,
Like months just died a quiet death.
No word, no close, no space to say,
Just gone… and I replay.


[DROP 2 – Beat Cut, Sub-Bass Hit, Distorted Reverb, Aggressive Male Shout]
You dipped quiet like memory don’t bite.
You vanished like saying one truth was too much fight.
Silence ain’t peace — it’s just weight left unpaid.


[Verse 2 – Double-Time Flow, Sharp Cadence, Industrial Drum Drive, Dry Mix]
Now you’re home — friends, lovers, new days,
Posting bright like I’m erased.
Do they know who held your storms?
Or am I a chapter you reform?

We weren’t clean, but we were steel,
Ugly love but brutally real.
Now I’m ghosted like none of it bled,
Like the last two years snapped like thread.

If I did that, you’d say I’m foul —
But when it’s you? It’s “healing,” it’s “style.”
You call it growth — I call it retreat.
You call it closure — but it's incomplete.


[DROP 3 – Half-Time Switch, Sub Growl, Glitch FX, Low-Male Ad-libs]
Ghostin’ ain’t grown — it’s fear delayed.
(No message means the truth got mislaid.)


[Verse 3 – Mid Flow, Reflective Tone, Snare Build, Low-End Drive]
You say the chaos hit you back home,
That old wounds flared, you felt alone.
I ain’t blind — I know your pain,
But silence cuts deeper than any flame.

One line from you could’ve eased the sting,
But quiet? Quiet does the dirtiest thing.
If I meant something, I’d hear it still —
But ghosts don’t talk — they just vanish at will.


[Verse 4 – Final Verse, Harsh Delivery, Full Drum Return, Saturated Bass]
Ghostin’ ain’t soft — it’s fear dressed clean.
A tidy exit from everything seen.
If this was peace, it wouldn’t tear,
Wouldn’t leave truth hanging in air.

Not here to beg, not here for blame,
But your silence still screams your name.
You left like fiction someone erased —
But truth don’t vanish — it stays unfaced.


[Outro – Spoken Word, Radio Static, Low-Pass Fade, Male Whisper Layer]
You could’ve said one line.
One breath.
One truth.

Instead you let silence rewrite the story.
Ghostin’ ain’t the end —
it’s just the exit
without the courage
to stay real.",
    "style": "UK Grime x UK Rap fusion, 140 BPM, Dark Minor Key, Deep Male British Vocal, Raw Delivery, Double Time Flow, Heavy 808 Sub, Industrial Texture, London Ambience, Cold Energy, raw vocal grit, sparse dark production, distorted bass, minimal synth stabs, dark atmosphere",
    "title": "Ghosted",
    "vocalGender": "m"
  },
  "response": {
    "taskId": "4e6360d472ca90d9b437d32d9479800a",

Instead you let silence rewrite the story.
Ghostin’ ain’t the end —
it’s just the exit
without the courage
to stay real.",

{
  "taskId": "9b4a036fb029e2ac63eab68ae100a0f5",
  "parentMusicId": "",
  "param": {
    "callBackUrl": "https://example.com/kie-suno-callback",
    "customMode": true,
    "instrumental": false,
    "model": "V5",
    "negativeTags": "female vocals",
    "prompt": "[Intro – Spoken Word, Low-Passed Drone, Rising Sub-Swell, Cold Street Ambience, Close-Mic Male Voice]
Not hate.  [Dry, quiet, almost whispered]
Not silence.  [Short delay tail]
Just gone.
Ghosting — the most coward move.
If you wouldn’t want it done to you,
Don’t do it to the ones who stood through your storms.
Let’s talk facts. 

------------------------------------------------------------

[Verse 1 – Cold Grit Flow, Tight Compression, Minimal Drum Layer, Forward Vocal Mix]
Two years deep on reckless roads
Nine years wild — no calm, just code
We clashed — no medals in that war
Both dropped lines we still abhor
But we came back — scarred, not fake
Not perfect love, just what truth makes

[DROP 1 – Beat Cut, Sub-Bass Explosion, Distorted Reverb, Aggressive Male Shout]
No pride in pain, no flex in scars  
But we bled truth in foreign bars  
Dust to dance, silence to screams  
That bond was forged beyond the seams  

But now you ghost — clean, no breath  
Like all that weight just met its death  
No word, no close, no final say  
Just gone… and I replay 

------------------------------------------------------------

[DROP 2 – Beat Cut, Sub-Bass Explosion, Distorted Reverb, Aggressive Male Shout]
You dipped quiet — like memory don’t scream louder than words.
Silence ain’t peace — it’s just guilt with no guts.


------------------------------------------------------------

[Verse 2 – Double-Time Flow, Sharp Cadence, Industrial Drum Drive, Dry Mix]
Now you’re home — fam, friends, lovers, safe face  
New feed, new days, my memory erased  
Do they know who stood through fire?  
Or am I just a name you retired?  

We weren’t clean, but we were real  
Messy love, forged in steel  
Now I’m ghosted like I ain’t bled  
Like the last two years snapped with one thread  

If I did that, you’d call it foul  
But when it’s you? That silence is style  
No closure, no end, no true release  
You call it growth — I call it peace deceased 

------------------------------------------------------------

[DROP 3 – Half-Time Switch, Sub Growl, Glitch FX, Beat Deconstruction, Low-Male Ad-libs]
Ghostin’ ain’t grown — it’s grief delayed.
(No message means you left your weight unpaid.) 


------------------------------------------------------------

[Verse 3 – Mid Flow, Reflective Tone, Snare Build, Low-End Drive, Dry Lead Vocal]
You say you found peace in that quiet fade
But real ones speak — they don’t evade
One message? Cost you nothin’, still
You left the bond unpaid — that’s the deal

You cleaned your exit, made it neat
Too sharp, too silent for all that heat
If I meant somethin’, I’d hear it still
But ghosts don’t speak — they just vanish at will

------------------------------------------------------------

[Verse 4 – Final Verse, Harsh Delivery, Full Drum Return, Saturated Bass, Distorted Male Vocal]
Ghostin’ ain’t soft — it’s fear in silk  
You dressed the cut in coward’s guilt  
If this was peace, it wouldn’t ache  
It wouldn’t leave a path so fake  

Not here to beg, not throw blame  
Just sayin’ — silence screams your name  
You left like we was fiction played  
But truth don’t vanish — it just stays unpaid  

------------------------------------------------------------

[Outro – Spoken Word, Radio Static, Low-Pass Fade, Male Whisper Layer]
You could’ve said one line.  
One breath.  
Instead, you let the past drown in silence.  
Ghostin’ ain’t the end — it’s just the exit without the courage to stay real.",
    "style": "Dark UK Grime, 140 BPM, Deep Male British Voice, Raw Aggressive Delivery, Tight Compression, Sub-Heavy Half-Time Drops, Distorted Lo-Fi Texture, Harsh Emotional Theme of Ghosted Friendship, harsh UK Grim Style, heavy bass drops.",
    "title": "Ghosted",
    "vocalGender": "m"
  },

Just sayin’ — silence screams your name  
You left like we was fiction played  
But truth don’t vanish — it just stays unpaid  

------------------------------------------------------------

[Outro – Spoken Word, Radio Static, Low-Pass Fade, Male Whisper Layer]
You could’ve said one line.  
One breath.  
Instead, you let the past drown in silence.  
Ghostin’ ain’t the end — it’s just the exit without the courage to stay real.",

nodes.title: Suno Node Info
widgets_values:
## KIE Suno Music Nodes — Quick Guide

This node pair connects ComfyUI to the **KIE Suno Generate Music** API. Use **Basic** for fast results and **Advanced** when you need fine‑tuning controls.

---
**Help Support the Development**

Please use this link with our affiliate code to help support the further development of this node pack.
[https://kie.ai](https://kie.ai?ref=e7565cf24a7fad4586341a87eaf21e42)

Project repository:  
[https://github.com/gateway/ComfyUI-Kie-API](https://github.com/gateway/ComfyUI-Kie-API)


## KIE Suno Music (Basic)

**Purpose**: Simple text‑to‑music generation with minimal inputs.

### Inputs
- **title** — Short track name (max 80 chars). 
     - Required in Custom Mode.
- **style** — Style / genre / vibe. 
     - Required in Custom Mode. Character limits depend on model (see Limits below).
- **prompt** — Main prompt or lyrics. 
     - Required in all modes. Character limits depend on model (see Limits below).
- **custom_mode** — When **true**, `style` and `title` are required. 
     - When **false**, only `prompt` is required and other fields are ignored by the API.
- **instrumental** — When **true** in Custom Mode, lyrics are omitted (style + title required). 
     - When **false**, prompt is used as lyrics.
- **model** — Select the Suno model (V4, V4_5, V4_5PLUS, V4_5ALL, V5). 
     - This changes prompt/style length limits.
- **negative_tags** — Words or styles to avoid (e.g., “heavy metal, upbeat drums”). 
     - Optional.
- **vocal_gender** — UI label is **male/female**. 
- **log** — Enable console logs for request status + polling updates.

### Outputs
- **audio** — The generated audio (ready for Preview/Save Audio nodes).
- **data** — Formatted JSON response (record‑info) from KIE for debugging/logging.

---

## KIE Suno Music (Advanced)

**Purpose**: Adds fine‑tuning controls for style/adherence/creative deviation.

Includes all Basic inputs plus:

### Inputs (Advanced Only)
- **style_weight** — Strength of adherence to style. Range 0–1 (2 decimals).
- **weirdness_constraint** — Controls creative deviation. Range 0–1 (2 decimals).
- **audio_weight** — Balance weight for audio features. Range 0–1 (2 decimals).

---

## Limits & Model Notes

**Custom Mode = true**
- `title` max: **80 chars** (all models)
- `prompt` max:
  - **V4**: 3000
  - **V4_5 / V4_5PLUS / V4_5ALL / V5**: 5000
- `style` max:
  - **V4**: 200
  - **V4_5 / V4_5PLUS / V4_5ALL / V5**: 1000

**Custom Mode = false**
- Only `prompt` required
- `prompt` max: **500** chars
- All other fields are ignored by the API

---

## Tips

- For first‑time users: start with **custom_mode = false**.
- Use **Advanced** only if you need tighter control over output character.
- Check KIE logs if a request fails or returns empty data.

---

## Development & Sponsorship

Development of this node pack is supported by **Dreaming Computers**  
[https://dreamingcomputers.com](https://dreamingcomputers.com)

Dreaming Computers is an independent creative and technical practice focused on AI-driven visuals, automation workflows, and experimental tools for artists and technologists.

nodes.title: Lyrics
widgets_values:
[Intro – Spoken Word, Low-Passed Drone, Rising Sub-Swell, Cold Street Ambience, Close-Mic Male Voice]
Not hate.  [Dry, quiet, almost whispered]
Not silence.  [Short delay tail]
Just gone.
Ghosting — the most coward move.
If you wouldn’t want it done to you,
Don’t do it to the ones who stood through your storms.
Let’s talk facts. 

------------------------------------------------------------

[Verse 1 – Cold Grit Flow, Tight Compression, Minimal Drum Layer, Forward Vocal Mix]
Two years deep on reckless roads
Nine years wild — no calm, just code
We clashed — no medals in that war
Both dropped lines we still abhor
But we came back — scarred, not fake
Not perfect love, just what truth makes

[DROP 1 – Beat Cut, Sub-Bass Explosion, Distorted Reverb, Aggressive Male Shout]
No pride in pain, no flex in scars  
But we bled truth in foreign bars  
Dust to dance, silence to screams  
That bond was forged beyond the seams  

But now you ghost — clean, no breath  
Like all that weight just met its death  
No word, no close, no final say  
Just gone… and I replay 

------------------------------------------------------------

[DROP 2 – Beat Cut, Sub-Bass Explosion, Distorted Reverb, Aggressive Male Shout]
You dipped quiet — like memory don’t scream louder than words.
Silence ain’t peace — it’s just guilt with no guts.


------------------------------------------------------------

[Verse 2 – Double-Time Flow, Sharp Cadence, Industrial Drum Drive, Dry Mix]
Now you’re home — fam, friends, lovers, safe face  
New feed, new days, my memory erased  
Do they know who stood through fire?  
Or am I just a name you retired?  

We weren’t clean, but we were real  
Messy love, forged in steel  
Now I’m ghosted like I ain’t bled  
Like the last two years snapped with one thread  

If I did that, you’d call it foul  
But when it’s you? That silence is style  
No closure, no end, no true release  
You call it growth — I call it peace deceased 

------------------------------------------------------------

[DROP 3 – Half-Time Switch, Sub Growl, Glitch FX, Beat Deconstruction, Low-Male Ad-libs]
Ghostin’ ain’t grown — it’s grief delayed.
(No message means you left your weight unpaid.) 


------------------------------------------------------------

[Verse 3 – Mid Flow, Reflective Tone, Snare Build, Low-End Drive, Dry Lead Vocal]
You say you found peace in that quiet fade
But real ones speak — they don’t evade
One message? Cost you nothin’, still
You left the bond unpaid — that’s the deal

You cleaned your exit, made it neat
Too sharp, too silent for all that heat
If I meant somethin’, I’d hear it still
But ghosts don’t speak — they just vanish at will

------------------------------------------------------------

[Verse 4 – Final Verse, Harsh Delivery, Full Drum Return, Saturated Bass, Distorted Male Vocal]
Ghostin’ ain’t soft — it’s fear in silk  
You dressed the cut in coward’s guilt  
If this was peace, it wouldn’t ache  
It wouldn’t leave a path so fake  

Not here to beg, not throw blame  
Just sayin’ — silence screams your name  
You left like we was fiction played  
But truth don’t vanish — it just stays unpaid  

------------------------------------------------------------

[Outro – Spoken Word, Radio Static, Low-Pass Fade, Male Whisper Layer]
You could’ve said one line.  
One breath.  
Instead, you let the past drown in silence.  
Ghostin’ ain’t the end — it’s just the exit without the courage to stay real.
